title: The Clue according to Sherlock Holmes
brief_description: A short film made for television of mystery and adventure and the search for buried treasure. Play detective, along with Sherlock Holmes (Keith McConnell) and Dr Watson (Laurie Main) as your hosts and follow ten year old Anthony Monday (Keith Mitchell and his friend Miss Ells (Dody Goodman) as they search for clues which will lead them to the buried fortune left behind by Alpheus T. Winterborn when he died. Cast also includes Louis Guss, Art Kassal, Hale Porter.
